name: Lightspark
description: Lightspark supports creating and paying offers.

name: Phoenix
description: Phoenix is a self-custodial Bitcoin wallet using Lightning to send/receive payments.

name: Strike
description: Strike announced in August 2024 support for paying to BOLT 12 offers using LNDK in their backend systems.

name: Breez SDK
description: Breez SDK Nodeless supports sending to BOLT 12 offers.

name: Misty Breez
description: Flutter mobile app that serves as a reference implementation for the Breez SDK - Nodeless

name: Ocean
description: Ocean Mining announced in April 2024 that miners can submit BOLT 12 offers to receive pool payouts over Lightning. "BOLT 12 lets us know when someone made a payment, the size of the payment, which node received the payment, and that it was paid in the first place."

name: Zeus
description: Zeus, a lightning wallet for the gods, has an alpha release that integrates with Twelve Cash, allowing Core Lightning users to create BOLT 12 offers and @twelve.cash usernames.

name: CoinOs
description: CoinOS supports sending and receiving to BOLT 12 offers.

name: Boltz
description: Boltz announced  BOLT 12 offer support for submarine swaps.

name: Human Readable Address
description: This BIP (Bitcoin Improvement Proposal) lets you put bitcoin payment info into DNS records, allowing users to pay to something resembling an email address. These can include BOLT 12 offers and any other static bitcoin payment identifier.

name: Twelve Cash
description: Twelve Cash is an implementation of Human Readable Payments (BIP 353). It includes an API to create @twelve.cash usernames in lightning apps and a website front-end for creating usernames and validating addresses.

name: Clams
description: Clams Remote, a tool for managing your Core Lightning node, allows you to create and pay BOLT 12 offers.

name: ROYGBIV
description: ROYGBIV is a prism plugin for Core Lightning, letting you create a BOLT 12 offer that, when paid to, automatically splits the payment into multiple receipts.

name: Ride the Lightning
description: RTL, a lightning node management UI, allows Core Lightning node operators to create BOLT 12 offers.

name: BOLT 12 Zapper
description: A Bitcoin++ 2024 hackathon project for zapping BOLT 12 offers in nostr profiles.

name: Lampo
description: A fast and modular lightning network implementation for all usages, written in Rust. lampo (lightning in Italian) is a experimental implementation of a tiny lightning node

name: payto
description: A Core Lightning (CLN) companion app that can pay to lightning address, LNURL, BIP 353 (DNS Payment Instructions) and BOLT 12 offers

name: BOLT 12 Playground
description: The BOLT 12 Playground from Strike provides a docker stack that comprises of bitcoind, LND, LNDK, CLN, Eclair and LDK Node. It connects everything together, initializes wallets, and creates channels between the nodes.

name: Plasma
description: Plasma is an app that lets you connect to your Core Lightning node directly over the Lightning network. It supports sending and receiving to BOLT 12 offers.

name: SatsToMe
description: SatsTo.me is a simple browser interface for resolving BIP 353 user names, which can be used to find BOLT 12 offers and other bitcoin payment information.

name: Entropy by D++
description: This site helps you create a BIP 353 username containing a BOLT 12 offer.

name: Eltor
description: Eltor ia a fork of the Tor network. It aims to incentivize Tor relays by charging for access with lightning payments conducted with BOLT 12 offers.
